commitResults.messageTitle: [#10805] Browse by topic listing comes over the text (fix padding) (#10864)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Fix UI bug in instructor help page

* Fix length-zero-no-unit in queries.scss

* Move media queries to end of scss file and remove queries.scss

* Delete modified package-lock.json

* Undo changes in package-lock.json

Co-authored-by: t-cheepeng <tcp97@hotmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Jeremy <ChooJeremy@Ymail.com>
Co-authored-by: Ahmed Bahajjaj <Ahmed_Bahajjaj@u.nus.edu>

commitResults.messageTitle: [#10788] Instructor view student list: incorrect state shown very briefly (feedback session page) (#10871)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Fix UI bug in instructor help page

* Fix length-zero-no-unit in queries.scss

* Add boolean flag and second check in session-edit-form component

* Remove accidental changes

* Remove hasCourseLoaded flag from instructor sessions page component

* Remove boolean flag as input from session edit form component

* Disable Add New Feedback Session button when courses are still loading

commitResults.messageTitle: [#10788] Instructor view student list: incorrect state shown very briefly (student list page) (#10872)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Fix UI bug in instructor help page

* Fix length-zero-no-unit in queries.scss

* Add second check to ensure student has loaded before checking the number of students in student list page

* Undo accidental changes

Co-authored-by: Ahmed Bahajjaj <Ahmed_Bahajjaj@u.nus.edu>

commitResults.messageTitle: [#11001] Migrate App Engine Text datastore type (#11019)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Replace usage of Text type from appengine datastore api with StringValue

* Use unindexed String as alternative over StringValue previously used to replace Text

* Simplify getters and setters

* Remove redundant architecture test method after deprecating use of datastore Text type

commitResults.messageTitle: [#11001] Handle datastore exceptions using the new Google-provided SDK (#11025)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Remove usage of DatastoreTimeoutException from old api

* Get WebApiServlet to throw specific datastore error messages

* Replace hard-coded values with enum values of google.rpc.Code

commitResults.messageTitle: [#11001] Final cleanup for Objectify V6 migration (#11034)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Remove usage of Text in FeedbackResponse class

* Clean up constructors

commitResults.messageTitle: [#10885] Fixed unresponsive question tab in instructor help page (#10921)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Updated grid system and fixed question tab expansion glitch in instructor help page

* update snapshot for question edit form

* update media max-width to fit medium screen size of grid system

* removed flex changes in question-edit-form.component.html, added it only in help page instead

commitResults.messageTitle: [#10920] Add front-end tests for student home page component (#10925)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Initial commit on student home page test

* Add test cases for sortBy ID and names; add more snapshot test cases

* Add test cases for router link navigation

* Add test cases for button & session status

* Add test cases for loadStudentCourses API endpoint

* refactored common data stubs for brevity & commented unix timestamp translation

Co-authored-by: Ahmed Bahajjaj <Ahmed_Bahajjaj@u.nus.edu>

commitResults.messageTitle: [#10920] Add front-end tests for instructor home page component (#10935)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Add test cases for loadCourses and loadFeedbackSessions

* Add test cases for getter and tab expansion

* Add test cases for archive course

* Add test cases for delete course

* refactored common data stubs for brevity

* commented on unix timestamp translation

* refactored duplicate test data for course and feedbackSession

commitResults.messageTitle: [#10955] Initial Objectify upgrade from v5 to v6 (#10956)
commitResults.messageBody:
* update objectify dependency to v6 and fix initial build issues

* reset localhost port to default

* updated cloud datastore cursor api for v6

* add missing Objectify.init() in base test case

* add project id information into Objectify.init()

* fixed wrong order from auto import

* include localDatastoreHelper test config

* fixed deleteEntity key id compatibility to v6

* updated e2e test setup for local datastore helper

* remove local datastore service test config

* remove not equal DB operation

* added local datastore helper for e2e testing

* Generate legacy key format consistent with the old appengine SDK

* moved localDatastoreHelper setup from OfyHelper to base test case

* moved datastore port config to build.template.properties

* improved on documentation

* refactored emulator port config

Co-authored-by: jianhandev <jianhanli.dev@gmail.com>

commitResults.messageTitle: [#11002] Separate emulator ports and include its setup into CI for tests (#11028)
